recycling.title: Recycling
recycling.description: Properly recycle your waste materials, such as paper, cardboard, glass, and plastic.

green_gifting.title: Green gifting
green_gifting.description: Turn every occasion into an opportunity to contribute to a greener planet (e.g. eco-friendly beauty products, handmade or locally crafted goods, books made from recycled materials)

energy_bulbs.title: Switch to energy-efficient bulbs
energy_bulbs.description: Replace your room/dorm room bulbs with energy-efficient options (ie. LED, CFL bulbs).

reusable_bottles.title: Use reusable water bottle
reusable_bottles.description: Switch to reusable water bottles instead of single-use plastic bottles.

clean_neighborhood.title: Clean your neighborhood
clean_neighborhood.description: Earn credits by cleaning up and removing litters in your campus or your neighborhood today.

eco_bag.title: Use eco bag
eco_bag.description: Earn credits for being an eco-conscious shopper. Use eco-friendly bags whenever you shop, reducing plastic waste.

plant_tree.title: Plant a tree
plant_tree.description: Earn a significant number of credits by planting a tree or participating in tree-planting events.
